INSERT INTO S_C_RPT_MAIN_TYPE ( VERSION, ITEMCODE, ITEMNAME, ITEMENNAME, ITEMDESC, CREATEUSER, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSER, UPDATETIME, ENABLEFLAG, ORDERNUM, EXFIELD01, EXFIELD02, CLASSIFYID, APPIDSTR, BIZMODE, STATTYPE, TYPECODE, EXDBFLAG, DATATEMPPATH, DATATEMPNAME, SHOWTEMPID, COLTYPECODE, COLSRCCODE, DATASRCCODE, EXPROCCODE, EXPROCPARAM, CROSSMATCHFLAG, RANKINGFLAG, SHOWTYPESTR, SHOWTYPEPARAM, CONDPANELURL, CONDFIELDCODE, CONDFIELDSTR, ORDERBYFIELDSTR ) VALUES ( 1, #itemCode#, #itemName#, #itemEnName#, #itemDesc#, #createUser#, #createTime#, #updateUser#, #updateTime#, #enableFlag#, #orderNum#, #exfield01#, #exfield02#, #classifyId#, #appIdStr#, #bizMode#, #statType#, #typeCode#, #exdbFlag#, #dataTempPath#, #dataTempName#, #showTempId#, #colTypeCode#, #colSrcCode#, #dataSrcCode#, #exprocCode#, #exprocParam#, #crossMatchFlag#, #rankingFlag#, #showTypeStr#, #showTypeParam#, #condPanelUrl#, #condFieldCode#, #condFieldStr#, #orderByFieldStr# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ITEMID

SELECT SEQ_T_BASEMODEL.NEXTVAL AS ITEMID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO S_C_RPT_MAIN_TYPE ( ITEMID, VERSION, ITEMCODE, ITEMNAME, ITEMENNAME, ITEMDESC, CREATEUSER, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSER, UPDATETIME, ENABLEFLAG, ORDERNUM, EXFIELD01, EXFIELD02, CLASSIFYID, APPIDSTR, BIZMODE, STATTYPE, TYPECODE, EXDBFLAG, DATATEMPPATH, DATATEMPNAME, SHOWTEMPID, COLTYPECODE, COLSRCCODE, DATASRCCODE, EXPROCCODE, EXPROCPARAM, CROSSMATCHFLAG, RANKINGFLAG, SHOWTYPESTR, SHOWTYPEPARAM, CONDPANELURL, CONDFIELDCODE, CONDFIELDSTR, ORDERBYFIELDSTR ) VALUES ( #itemId#, 1, #itemCode#, #itemName#, #itemEnName#, #itemDesc#, #createUser#, #createTime#, #updateUser#, #updateTime#, #enableFlag#, #orderNum#, #exfield01#, #exfield02#, #classifyId#, #appIdStr#, #bizMode#, #statType#, #typeCode#, #exdbFlag#, #dataTempPath#, #dataTempName#, #showTempId#, #colTypeCode#, #colSrcCode#, #dataSrcCode#, #exprocCode#, #exprocParam#, #crossMatchFlag#, #rankingFlag#, #showTypeStr#, #showTypeParam#, #condPanelUrl#, #condFieldCode#, #condFieldStr#, #orderByFieldStr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE S_C_RPT_MAIN_TYPE SET VERSION=VERSION+1, ITEMCODE=#itemCode#, ITEMNAME=#itemName#, ITEMENNAME=#itemEnName#, ITEMDESC=#itemDesc#, UPDATEUSER=#updateUser#, UPDATETIME=#updateTime#, ENABLEFLAG=#enableFlag#, ORDERNUM=#orderNum#, EXFIELD01=#exfield01#, EXFIELD02=#exfield02#, CLASSIFYID=#classifyId#, APPIDSTR=#appIdStr#, BIZMODE=#bizMode#, STATTYPE=#statType#, TYPECODE=#typeCode#, EXDBFLAG=#exdbFlag#, DATATEMPPATH=#dataTempPath#, DATATEMPNAME=#dataTempName#, SHOWTEMPID=#showTempId#, COLTYPECODE=#colTypeCode#, COLSRCCODE=#colSrcCode#, DATASRCCODE=#dataSrcCode#, EXPROCCODE=#exprocCode#, EXPROCPARAM=#exprocParam#, CROSSMATCHFLAG=#crossMatchFlag#, RANKINGFLAG=#rankingFlag#, SHOWTYPESTR=#showTypeStr#, SHOWTYPEPARAM=#showTypeParam#, CONDPANELURL=#condPanelUrl#, CONDFIELDCODE=#condFieldCode#, CONDFIELDSTR=#condFieldStr#, ORDERBYFIELDSTR=#orderByFieldStr# WHERE ITEMID=#itemId# AND VERSION=#version#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM S_C_RPT_MAIN_TYPE WHERE ITEMID=#itemId# AND VERSION=#version#

DELETE FROM S_C_RPT_MAIN_TYPE WHERE ITEMID IN
#itemIdList[]#
